__TOC__

Since one of the release goals for HoaryHedgehog is:
<pre>
Ubuntu is a Linux distribution for the desktop or the server that includes
all of Debian as well as most of the packages of apt-get.org, with a fast 
and easy install, regular releases (every six months), a tight selection 
of excellent packages installed by default and a commitment to security 
updates with 18 months of security and technical support for every release.
</pre>

the source archives of http://www.apt-get.org have to be reviewed.
'''If you have concerns about any of the packages, PLEASE tell us and comment on this page!'''
